name: Unreal Saved Game File
summary: Learn about .USA files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Unreal allows up to nine games to be saved at one time. The save files are named "save0.usa" through "save8.usa" and are saved in the "Unreal\Save\" folder. Quick saves are stored in "save9.usa." References to the save files are stored in the "User.ini" file in the same directory.

description: Game saved in Unreal or Unreal 2 first-person shooter games; saves the progress of the player and allows the game to be loaded from the point when the game was saved.
